name: fin-block
description: balenaBlock that provides a simple interface for controlling the balenaFin's coprocessor running the firmata protocol.

scripts.docker-dev: docker run -d -p 5000:5000 --restart=always --name registry registry:2 || true && docker buildx build -t localhost:5000/fin-block:latest --platform linux/arm/v7 --file Dockerfile.template . && docker push localhost:5000/fin-block:latest
scripts.docker-release: docker buildx build -t balenablocks/fin-block:latest --platform linux/arm/v7 --file Dockerfile.template . && docker push balenablocks/fin-block:latest
scripts.docs: rimraf docs/ && npx typedoc src/ --readme README.md --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --includeVersion --excludeExternals
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:fast: npm run build && npm run test:node

author: Alex Bucknall <alexbucknall@balena.io>
